ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about  Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: uh heh yeah it works.. trust me, i was on the test server during race wars.. i was lvl 5 warrior.. anyways a level 10 or so necro gnome casted fear on me out
ygData.messageBody:
uh heh yeah it works.. trust me, i was on the test server during race wars..
i was lvl 5 warrior.. anyways a level 10 or so necro gnome casted fear on me
out of the blue... next thing i know ive lost control of my charecter and im
running like mad... but the necro and his pet are pounding me from behind. i
regain cotrol only after i had about half a bubble left.

--JT
----- Original Message -----
From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 11:27 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Another Question about Fear


> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> Thanks for your answers, just what I thought.
>
> Can you tell me though does Fear work on PC's not just on NPC's. i.e. in a
> PvP situation?
>
> Thanks
>
> Nynenom
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mystik [mailto:mystik@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:32 AM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Fear Vs Spook the undead
>
>
> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> it depends on what you're fearing....if you're in unrest, just use spook
> since it's less mana....but fear is good anywhere else
>
> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> lv 41 human cleric of The Rathe
>
> Chas Watkins wrote:
>
> > From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
> >
> > I am about to get fear. Can I still use Spook against the undead. Or
will
> > Fear be more successful.
> >
> > It's just that Fear takes 40 Mana while Spook takes just 10 Mana.
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Nynenom
> > Rallos Zek
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
